mapper.select: select CTG_LEVEL, CTG_NAME, CTG_CODE, CTG_CODEREF from PRODUCT_CATEGORY start with CTG_CODEREF is null connect by prior CTG_CODE = CTG_CODEREF
mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT (PD_NUM, PD_NAME, CTG_CODE, PD_PRICE, PD_STOCK, PD_CONTENT, PD_MAINIMAGE, PD_SUBIMAGE) values (PRODUCT_SEQ.nextval, #{pd_name, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{ctg_code, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{pd_price, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{pd_stock, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{pd_content, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{pd_mainImage, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{pd_subImage, jdbcType = VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from PRODUCT order by PD_NUM desc

select p.PD_NUM, p.PD_NAME, p.CTG_CODE, pc.CTG_CODEREF, pc.CTG_NAME, PD_PRICE, PD_STOCK, PD_CONTENT, PD_MAINIMAGE, PD_SUBIMAGE, PD_REGISTER_DATETIME, p.PD_MAINIMAGE, p.PD_SUBIMAGE from PRODUCT p inner join PRODUCT_CATEGORY pc on p.CTG_CODE = PC.CTG_CODE where p.PD_NUM = #{pd_num, jdbcType = NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: delete PRODUCT where PD_NUM = #{pd_num, jdbcType = NUMERIC}
